jobDescription: BS in Computer Science or equivalent required 2-3 years of Unity programming experience. Fresh graduates are also encouraged to apply Must have shipped at least one competitive game for iOS and Android using Unity .Experienced Application Developer with launched/published products for iOS / Android required Proficiencies desired: Unity Experience with object-oriented design and implementation Experience with source code management in a collaborative environment Experience with API creation/management Ability to quickly learn complex systems and new technologies
